title: Pfizer’s Fast and Lucrative Vaccine Distribution
itunes:title: Pfizer’s Fast and Lucrative Vaccine Distribution
description:
As reported in the story "Pfizer’s Fast, Fraught and Lucrative Vaccine Distribution," the company is a hero of the pandemic for its Covid-fighting wonder shot. That doesn’t mean it hasn’t made entire countries angry.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
